resources.string:
Developed by Ajay Gopinath of CyanoJay Works. Copyright © 2012. All Rights Reserved.

School Loop\u00AE and the School Loop logo are registered trademarks of School Loop, Inc.
The \'Username\' is the username that is used to log in to your or your child\'s school\'s School Loop web portal.
The \'Password\' text field is the password that is used to log in to your or your child\'s school\'s School Loop web portal.

The \'School Loop Site Prefix\' is the first part of your or your child\'s School Loop website URL. For example, for Monta Vista High School, the URL is \"montavista.schoolloop.com\". The prefix should then be \'montavista\'. In general, the prefix should be the * part of \"*.schoolloop.com\".
No grades have been entered for this course
